DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy combination etanercept 50 mg weekly plus methotrexate methotrexate monotherapy treatment rheumatoid arthritis 88 week .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Etanercept Combination With Methotrexate Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis rheumatoid arthritis . Currently receive optimal dose oral Methotrexate ( MTX ) ( least 15 mg/week 25 mg/week ) treatment rheumatoid arthritis . Active rheumatoid arthritis time screen . Previous current treatment etanercept , tumor necrosis factoralpha ( TNF ) inhibitor , biologic agent . Concurrent treatment diseasemodifying antirheumatoid drug ( DMARD ) , MTX within 28 day baseline . Concurrent treatment 1 nonsteroid antiinflammatory drug ( NSAID ) baseline .
